action.action-desc: Mr. Bera introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3817 Marysville Boulevard in Sacramento, California, as the Grantland Johnson Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3817 Marysville Boulevard in Sacramento, California, shall be known and designated as the Grantland Johnson Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Grantland Johnson Post Office.
